# blacktools.ai

> Last updated: December 2024

> blacktools.ai is an AI video generation platform for creating UGC-style marketing videos. The platform uses advanced text-to-video and video synthesis models with a library of 300+ AI avatars supporting 30+ languages.

## Platform Overview

- **Category:** AI Video Generation (SaaS)
- **Use Cases:** UGC ads, product videos, social media content, marketing videos
- **AI Technology:** Text-to-video generation, video synthesis, proprietary lip-sync engine
- **Avatar Library:** 300+ avatars across various demographics
- **Language Support:** 30+ languages with lip synchronization
- **Export Options:** Up to 4K resolution, multiple aspect ratios (9:16, 1:1, 4:5, 16:9)

## Pricing

### Subscription Plans

| Plan | Price | Credits/Month |
|------|-------|---------------|
| Starter | $24.50/month | 550 |
| Pro | $39.50/month | 1,200 |
| Premium | $59.50/month | 2,500 |
| Enterprise | Custom | Unlimited |

### Pay-As-You-Go

Credits can be purchased without subscription at $0.022 per credit.

### Credit Usage

Credits are consumed per generation. A typical 30-second video uses approximately 5-10 credits depending on complexity.

### Plan Features

**Starter:** 100+ avatars, 10 languages, 1080p export, email support

**Pro:** 200+ avatars, 20+ languages, 4K export, batch processing (3 concurrent), priority support

**Premium:** 300+ avatars, 30+ languages, 4K export, batch processing (10 concurrent), custom avatar creation, priority support

## Technology

### AI Capabilities

- **Text-to-Video:** Generates video content from text descriptions
- **Video Synthesis:** Creates realistic visual output in multiple styles
- **LipSync Engine:** Proprietary audio-visual synchronization for 30+ languages
- **Voice Synthesis:** Natural-sounding text-to-speech with 100+ voices

### Features

- Avatar-based video creation
- Multi-language voice and lip synchronization
- Batch video processing
